attributes.action: Levy a Tax on Every Foreign Lorry when it Enters the UK to contribute towards our highway maintainance and each HGV to carry proof of roadworthiness and insurance and these documents to be checked at customs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the increasing number of Foreign Lorrys / HGV's on our roads having the benefit of cheaper fuel, this puts our British haulage companies at a huge disadvantage. They need to have a fair and level playing field in order to survive. I propose a levy for each time a Foreign registered HGV enters the UK to redress the balance and help to maintain our roads and give our haulage industry a chance.

Also For customs to check each HGV as it enters for current documentary evidence of roadworthiness and Insurance.

Thank you
